title: Welcome to this lovely three bedroom/1 bathroom home!
posting_body: ['Captain Dreyfus is a smartly furnished, Spanish-style single level 1 bed/1 bath Denver home in a quiet, tree-lined neighborhood.', 'The home features a beautifully remodeled granite kitchen and great room with vaulted ceilings.', 'From the spacious master king bedroom, step out onto a landscaped patio for morning coffee or to watch the sunset.', 'It features a vaulted ceiling, ensuite granite double-vanity bath and walk-in closet.', 'Bedroom #2 has a queen bed, dresser, mirror, closet and ceiling fan and is bright and sunny.', 'Bedroom # has a twin bed, closet, ceiling fan and desk space.', '.Real', 'Estate Agent All have new premium mattresses.', 'Sleeps up to 5.', 'The dedicated Spanish-tiled laundry room offers an oversized washer/dryer set and overhead cabinets.', 'Space for one car is available in the garage.', 'The private backyard is beautifully landscaped and offers a water feature, grassy area for lawn games, and covered seating area.']
